sentence.text: In this study, we found XIST expresmelanosome organizationon level was upregulated in colon cancer tissues and cell lines.

In short, the current study suggests XIST plays as an important role in colon cancer progresmelanosome organizationon targeted by protein polyubiquitination-34a via Wnt/b-catenin signaling pathway, providing a novel insight for the pathogenesis and underlying therapeutic target for colon cancer
